kpi_info.title: Incoming 3G to 2G ISHO attempts, e2e
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the amount of all incoming inter system handover attempts from 3G to 2G. All failures caused by ME, MS and network are included
kpi_info.formula:
sum(IU_SUCC_INTRA_PAPU_3G_2G_SHO + IU_FAIL_INTRA_PAPU_3G_2G_SHO +
IU_SUCC_INTER_PAPU_3G_2G_SHO + IU_FAIL_INTER_PAPU_3G_2G_SHO)

counters from table(s): p_sgsn_mobility_management
